<div class="board-container panel">
  <!-- Reference https://www.1001freedownloads.com/free-clipart/dartboard -->
  <svg id="dartboard-panel" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="-250 -250 500 500" xml:space="preserve">
    <defs id="defs6">
      <line id="refwire" y2="167.4" y1="16.2" stroke="#c0c0c0" x2="26.52" x1="2.566"></line>
      <path id="SLICE" stroke-width="0" d="m0 0l15.64 98.77c-10.362 1.64-20.918 1.64-31.28 0l15.64-98.77z"></path>
      <use id="double" xlink:href="#SLICE" transform="scale(1.695)" height="500" width="500" y="0" x="0"></use>
      <use id="outer" xlink:href="#SLICE" transform="scale(1.605)" height="500" width="500" y="0" x="0"></use>
      <use id="triple" xlink:href="#SLICE" transform="scale(1.065)" height="500" width="500" y="0" x="0"></use>
      <use id="inner" xlink:href="#SLICE" transform="scale(.975)" height="500" width="500" y="0" x="0"></use>
    </defs>
    <g id="board-container-panel"  transform="matrix(1.104 0 0 -1.104 -1.3036 -.48743)">
